name: TestFairy Ltd
description: Developer of an online application testing platform designed to integrate bug-tracking and update user experience. The company's online application testing platform allows users a seamless branded corporate experience for downloading apps and reporting bugs, enabling users to update their application continuously with various technical reforms.
